messages.subject: Sword Pictures
messages.msgSnippet: I am not very good at evaluating swords.  However, from the shape of the handle it looks like an imperial navy sword.  I am not sure though.  I base this
messages.messageBody:
I am not very good at evaluating swords. However, from the shape of
the handle it looks like an imperial navy sword. I am not sure
though. I base this judgement on a replica of an imperial navy
dagger I saw, but the shape was identical to that. Please correct me
if I am wrong. I would love to learn more about swords.
